author: juneb
body: I don't understand the risk that this cmdlet poses. There doesn't seem to be any need for SupportsShouldProcess = $True. I can submit a PR for this change, but before I do, I wanted to see if there was any need for this that I didn't foresee.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Can it clobber an existing file?  If so, I think that meets the bar for needing SupportsShouldProcess.

title: New-ModuleManifest doesn't need SupportsShouldProcess
